decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (DWG-QUNSB200719-2, DWG-QUNSB200719-3, DWG-QUNSB200719-4 and design and access statement received on 11/01/2016, DWG-QUNSB200719-1 received on 14/01/2016, Tree report and email confirming ground works received 16/02/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes incidental to the residential use of the dwelling known as Stansfield, 42 High Street, TW5 9RU.

Condition : 5 - Within the first planting season following the substantial completion of the development hereby approved, a tree shall be planted to the rear of the garden along the southern boundary to replace the Leylandii which is to be felled. The tree shall be a Holly or Hazel tree unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority. 

If within a period of two years from the date of the planting of the tree, that tree, or any tree planted in replacement for it, is removed, uprooted or destroyed or dies, (or becomes, in the opinion of the local planning authority, seriously damaged or defective,) another tree of the same species and size as that originally planted shall be planted at the same place, unless the local planning authority gives its written consent to any variation.
description: Erection of a single storey outbuilding at the rear garden of the house.
